channel.title: survival-analysis on YoungStatS
channel.description: Recent content in survival-analysis on YoungStatS

item.title: Some Recent Developments in Mixture Cure Model Methodology for Survival Analysis
item.description: Abstract The mixture cure model in survival analysis has received large and growing attention in the last few decades. Here we present an overview drawing together early results and some recent new developments, and pointing out areas where further work is needed. Introduction: the Mixture Cure Model In certain clinical trials or observational studies, either prospective or based on historically accumulated data, individuals are or have been followed up for a period of time and their status at some endpoint reported.
